Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: CreateConfigurationSuccessCompletion
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: A callback to be run with a VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration on configuration setup succeed.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: CreateConfigurationFailCompletion
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: A callback to be run with an error when configuration setup fail.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: environment
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: String object, organization vault environment with data region.(e.g. “live”, “live-eu1”, “sandbox”). Default is sandbox.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressC.name: validCountries
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressC.abstract: List of valid country codes in ISO-3166-1-alpha-2 format.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomRouteConfigurat.name: path
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomRouteConfigurat.abstract: Inbound rout path for your organization vault.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomRouteConfigurat.name: hostnamePolicy
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomRouteConfigurat.abstract: Hostname policy (specifies different hosts how to send your data). Default is vault.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressL.name: VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressLine1Options
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressL.abstract: Holds billing address, address line 1 field options.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressL.name: VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressLine2Options
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressL.abstract: Holds billing address, address line 2 field options for custom configuration.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressC.name: VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressCountryOptions
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressC.abstract: Holds billing address country field options for custom configuration.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressP.name: VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressPostalCodeOptions
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomBillingAddressP.abstract: Holds billing address postal code (zip in US) field options.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguationBil.name: VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguationBillingAddressOptions
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguationBil.abstract: Holds billing address options for custom configuration.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: Holds configuration with predefined setup for work with payment orchestration app, confirms to VGSCheckoutBasicConfigurationProtocol.

Structs/VGSCheckoutLoggingConfiguration..name: isNetworkDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSCheckoutLoggingConfiguration..abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to record VGSCheckout network session with success/failed requests. Default is false.

Structs/VGSCheckoutLoggingConfiguration..name: isExtensiveDebugEnabled
Structs/VGSCheckoutLoggingConfiguration..abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to enable extensive debugging. Default is false.

Classes/VGSCheckoutLogger.html.name: VGSCheckoutLogger
Classes/VGSCheckoutLogger.html.abstract: VGSCheckoutLogger encapsulates logging logic and debugging options for VGSCheckout. Use .configuration property to setup these options. VGSCheckoutLogger logging implies only printing logs to Xcode console. It doesn’t save logs to persistent store/local file, also it doesn’t send debugging logs to backend services.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.name: regex
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.abstract: Regex Pattern required to detect Payment Card Brand

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.name: cvcLengths
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.abstract: Valid Card CVC/CVV Lengths. For most brands valid cvc lengths is [3], while for Amex is [4]. For unknown brands can be set as [3, 4]

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.name: checkSumAlgorithm
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.abstract: Check sum validation algorithm. For most brands card number can be validated by VGSCheckoutCheckSumAlgorithmType.luhn algorithm. If none - result of Checksum Algorithm validation will be true.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.name: cvcIcon
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomPaymentCardMode.abstract: Image, associated with CVC for Payment Card Brand.

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: regex
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: Regex validating that input contains digits only.

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: cvcLengths
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: Valid Unknown Card CVC/CVV Lengths. For most brands valid cvc lengths is [3], while for Amex is [4]. For unknown brands can be set as [3, 4]

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: checkSumAlgorithm
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: Check sum validation algorithm. For most brands card number can be validated by VGSCheckoutCheckSumAlgorithmType.luhn algorithm. If none - result of Checksum Algorithm validation will be true.

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: formatPattern
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: Unknown Payment Card Numbers visual format pattern. NOTE: format pattern length limits input length.

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: brandIcon
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: Image, associated with Unknown Payment Card Brands.

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: cvcIcon
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: Image, associated with CVC for Unknown Payment Card Brands.

Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.name: regex
Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.abstract: Regex Pattern required to detect Payment Card Brand

Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.name: cvcLengths
Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.abstract: Valid Card CVC/CVV Lengths. For most brands valid cvc lengths is [3], while for Amex is [4]. For unknown brands can be set as [3, 4]

Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.name: checkSumAlgorithm
Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.abstract: Check sum validation algorithm. For most brands card number can be validated by VGSCheckoutCheckSumAlgorithmType.luhn algorithm. If none - result of Checksum Algorithm validation will be true.

Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.name: cvcIcon
Structs/VGSCheckoutPaymentCardModel.html.abstract: Image, associated with CVC for Payment Card Brand.

Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards/CardBran.name: custom(brandName:)
Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards/CardBran.abstract: Custom Payment Card Brand. Should have unique brandName.

Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards/CardBran.name: cardLengths
Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards/CardBran.abstract: Returns array with valid card number lengths for specific VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.CardBrand

Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.html#/s:.name: unknown
Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.html#/s:.abstract: Unknown Brand Payment Card Model. Can be used for specifing cards details when VGSValidationRulePaymentCard requires validating CardBrand.unknown cards.

Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.html#/s:.name: validCardBrands
Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.html#/s:.abstract: An array of valid Card Brands, could include custom and default brands. If not set, will use availableCardBrands array instead.

Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.html.name: VGSCheckoutPaymentCards
Classes/VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.html.abstract: Class responsible for storing and managing Payment Cards in SDK.

Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.name: VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardModel
Structs/VGSCheckoutUnknownPaymentCardMod.abstract: An object representing Unknown Payment Cards - cards not defined in the SDK. Object is used when validation forCardBrand.unknown is set as true. Check VGSValidationRulePaymentCard for more details. Validation attributes can be edited through `VGSCheckoutPaymentCards.unknown model.

Enums/VGSCheckoutDataMergePolicy.html#/s.name: flat
Enums/VGSCheckoutDataMergePolicy.html#/s.abstract: FieldName will be treated as a flat key without any nested levels.

Enums/VGSCheckoutDataMergePolicy.html#/s.name: nestedWithArrayOverwrite
Enums/VGSCheckoutDataMergePolicy.html#/s.abstract: Map field name to nested JSON and array if array index is specified.

Enums/VGSCheckoutDataMergePolicy.html#/s.name: nestedWithArrayMerge
Enums/VGSCheckoutDataMergePolicy.html#/s.abstract: Map field name to nested JSON and array if array index is specified.

Enums/VGSCheckoutHostnamePolicy.html#/s:.name: customHostname(_:)
Enums/VGSCheckoutHostnamePolicy.html#/s:.abstract: Custom host URL. Should be configured on the dashboard.

Enums/VGSCheckoutHostnamePolicy.html#/s:.name: local(_:port:)
Enums/VGSCheckoutHostnamePolicy.html#/s:.abstract: Configuration for local testing with VGS Satellite.

Structs/VGSCheckoutRequestOptions.html#/.name: extraData
Structs/VGSCheckoutRequestOptions.html#/.abstract: Extra data, should be valid JSON. Default is nil.

Structs/VGSCheckoutRequestOptions.html#/.name: mergePolicy
Structs/VGSCheckoutRequestOptions.html#/.abstract: Merge options or merge policy, default is flat.

Enums/VGSCheckoutFormValidationBehaviour.name: onSubmit
Enums/VGSCheckoutFormValidationBehaviour.abstract: Validate fields and display errors on submit.

Enums/VGSCheckoutFormValidationBehaviour.name: onFocus
Enums/VGSCheckoutFormValidationBehaviour.abstract: Validate fields and display errors on end editing. Revalidate form on submit.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.name: checkoutSubmitButtonBackgroundColor
Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.abstract: The background color of the submit button.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.name: checkoutSubmitButtonSuccessBackgroundColor
Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.abstract: The background color of the submit button on success.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.name: checkoutSubmitButtonTitleColor
Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.abstract: The text color of the submit button title.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.name: checkoutSubmitButtonTitleFont
Protocols/VGSCheckoutSubmitButtonThemePr.abstract: The font of the submit button title.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutTextFieldThemeProto.name: textFieldHintTextColor
Protocols/VGSCheckoutTextFieldThemeProto.abstract: The text color of the textfield hint (above the text field).

Protocols/VGSCheckoutTextFieldThemeProto.name: textFieldHintTextFont
Protocols/VGSCheckoutTextFieldThemeProto.abstract: The font of the textfield hint (above the text field).

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: textFieldBorderColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The textfield’s border background color. Default is .systemGray.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: textFieldTextColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The text color of the textfield. Default is .vgsInputBlackTextColor (black).

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: textFieldTextFont
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The font of the textfield. Default is .body with .medium weight.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: textFieldHintTextColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The text color of the textfield hint (above the text field). Default is .vgsSystemGray2Color (black).

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: textFieldHintTextFont
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The font of the textfield hint (above the text field). Default is .caption1.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: checkoutSectionViewBackgroundColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The section view’s background color. Default is .vgsSystemBackground (white).

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: checkoutFormSectionTitleFont
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The font of the section title. Default is .title3 with .bold weight.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: checkoutFormSectionTitleColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The text color of the section title. Default is .vgsSectionTitleColor.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: textFieldErrorLabelFont
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The font of the error label. Default is .caption2.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: checkoutSubmitButtonSuccessBackgroundColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The background color of the submit button on success. Default is .systemGreen.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: checkoutSubmitButtonTitleColor
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The text color of the submit button title. Default is .lightText.

Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.name: checkoutSubmitButtonTitleFont
Structs/VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme.html#/s:.abstract: The font of the submit button title. Default is .title3 with .regular weight.

Structs/VGSCheckoutBillingAddressCountry.name: validCountries
Structs/VGSCheckoutBillingAddressCountry.abstract: / List of valid country codes in ISO-3166-1-alpha-2 format.

Structs/VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerial.name: monthFieldName
Structs/VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerial.abstract: Field Name that will be used as a JSON key with month value from expDate string on send request.

Structs/VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerial.name: yearFieldName
Structs/VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerial.abstract: Field Name that will be used as a JSON key with year value from expDate string on send request.

Structs/VGSCheckoutExpirationDateOptions.name: inputDateFormat
Structs/VGSCheckoutExpirationDateOptions.abstract: Input date format to convert. Default is .shortYear.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCardHolderOptions/Fie.name: single(_:)
Structs/VGSCheckoutCardHolderOptions/Fie.abstract: Display card holder as a single field.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCardHolderOptions.htm.name: fieldNameType
Structs/VGSCheckoutCardHolderOptions.htm.abstract: Field name type. Default is .single. with empty fieldName.

Structs/VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerial.name: VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerializer
Structs/VGSCheckoutExpDateSeparateSerial.abstract: Expiration Date Separate serializer, split date string to components with separate fieldNames

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.name: environment
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.abstract: String object, organization vault environment with data region.(e.g. “live”, “live-eu1”, “sandbox”). Default is sandbox.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.name: uiTheme
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.abstract: Form UI configuration attributes, default is VGSCheckoutDefaultTheme object.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutConfigurationProtoc.name: environment
Protocols/VGSCheckoutConfigurationProtoc.abstract: String object, organization vault environment with data region.(e.g. “live”, “live-eu1”, “sandbox”). Default is sandbox.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.name: VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.abstract: Holds configuration for vault payment processing with custom configuration, conforms to VGSCheckoutBasicConfigurationProtocol.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.name: checkoutDidFinish(with:)
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.abstract: Tells the delegate that checkout flow did finish with result.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.name: checkoutDidCancel()
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.abstract: Tells the delegate that user cancelled checkout flow (closed checkout screen.)

Classes/VGSCheckout.html#/s:14VGSCheckou.name: delegate
Classes/VGSCheckout.html#/s:14VGSCheckou.abstract: An object that acts as a VGSCheckout delegate.

Classes/VGSCheckout.html.name: VGSCheckout
Classes/VGSCheckout.html.abstract: A drop-in class that presents a checkout form for financial operations: add card, payment processing etc.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html.name: VGSCheckoutDelegate
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html.abstract: A set of methods to notify about changes in checkout state.
